questions.question: What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? And furthermore how far can it fly without exausting itself? Surely such a small creature must make regular rests especially if it carries something as large as a bloody coconut. Assuming you aren't talking about some silly tiny coconut
questions.author: Monty

questions.question: Do ya feel lucky punk? Well do yah?

questions.question: Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?
